name: Dear Elise (C.D)
description:
There's a door in the forest behind your childhood home.

Overgrown with ivy and moss, camoflagued behind vines that hide it from wandering eyes, it sits, unopened.

You'd always been curious as to what sat beyond it, but no matter how much you searched, there would be no person nor paper no site that could explain its purpose or reason for existence.

Today is the day.

Today is the day you gather your courage, and you get through that door.

One way, or another.

-(0)-

Explore an underground complex. Find tapes and entries. Figure out passwords to doors. Discover what happened to the people who'd inhabited the place beyond the door.

Dear Elise is an interactice twine game that was made for the Running Out of Ink anthology, with the prompt "limited space".

If you enjoy this game, make sure to check out the anthology page here, and check out the other wonderful games created by the other members from the project!

I'd like to give thanks to everyone who made this possible!

My producers from Running Out of Ink: Mido, Ro, and Oneeb.

My voice director: Maxi

And the wonderful voice actresses who brought two of the characters from the game alive: Ariane and Robyn!

Please check out all of their links and socials!

Thank you for checking out my game, and I hope you enjoy!
